channel.title: New at this need help
channel.description: Ok well i used the Galkons Base client and i made a private server. So now i need to know how to be an admin, change stats, make it so admins and me the owner can use commands. Ive changed the owners name to mine but i dont have the golden crown. Im new at this and i need help. Ill give you the client and server if you like so you can do this for me if you want. I just need a tut or something for it. Thanks alot if you help

item.title: New at this need help
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Maul Ancient Maul
item.description:
@Ancient_Maul wrote:

dang its hard when u first start hey, in your server file goto characters and open your usernames text folder, then up the top change the:

    character-rights = 0;

to:

    character-rights = 3;

then u be a owner. xD

Read full topic
